item.description:
Did you have a New Years Resolution to be healthy or exercise more? Have you kept that promise to yourself? Here is your chance to have fun exercising in a no pressure group setting at a great price.

This 4 week bootcamp series, Saturday's 2-3pm at AMA Personal Training Fitness Studio in Weymouth for only $35 starts on April 21st. We will work on resistance & strength training working our legs, arms, gluts and core as well as some flexibility training.

This session is only open to 8 people, so reserve your spot soon!

IF space is available, the drop in rate will be $10 per class. Payment will be required at the first class.

This is a great way to get ready for the upcoming summer season!
item.how_to_find_us: Park in back and the back door will be open

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: BOOTCAMP! 4 Week Session
